ej,laket001,P,nelss901,Call at HP $Indians catcher Tim Laker blocked the plate and thought Torii Hunter missed the plate on his head first slide; Laker ran after Hunter and tagged him; when HP umpire Scott Nelson called Hunter safe, Laker exploded and was ejected by Nelson; Laker was led off the field but threw his mask, glove and the ball and then the bat boy's stool onto the field for arguing the call at HP2003CLE.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

Sanchez went back to 2nd just as ball arrived. He was tagged nearly simultaneously with the ball being caught by the 2nd baseman on the base.  The umpire pointed to Sanchez and called him safe, but he thought the umpire called him out and left the field.  Umpires conferred and ruled Sanchez out for leaving base.  The run from third (Santiago) was disallowed because he had slowed up and did not cross the plate before Sanchez vacated the base.  Originally called DP, not GDP, but GDP added later2003CLE.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
